creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: steep grey stone steps leading up to a richly colored red and white 5-storied pagoda; lush green foliage surrounds the scene
inscription: Left: [?????　?????　室生の塔] {1954 nen saku, Nihon no ishidera, Murō no tō}; bottom, in pencil: [Pagoda in Murō] [Hodaka Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Pagoda in Murō
